# MKAddressRepresentations.ContextStyle.full

**Case**

The value that represents the full context style.

## Declaration

```swift
case full
```

## Discussion

The value that tells the framework to include all relevant context. For example, when used with [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKAddressRepresentations/cityWithContext(_:)] MapKit always includes the region name if the device is in that region.

## Available context styles

- **MKAddressRepresentations.ContextStyle.automatic**: The value that represents the automatic context style.
- **MKAddressRepresentations.ContextStyle.short**: The value that represents the short context style.
